form.name: Name
form.errorname: Your name must be at least 5 letters long
form.erroremail: You must enter a valid email adress
form.errormessage: Your message must be at least 50 letters long

chwmodalv2.title: Current version for the Showcase site of CH-WebVision, the self-business created for my secondary activity
chwmodalv2.text1: Current version of the projet aiming to present my activity and serving as a showcase and portfolio for my self-business
chwmodalv2.text3: First project carried out with the Wordpress CMS
chwmodalv2.text4: Use of numerous plugins for its creation
chwmodalv2.text5: Deploy a locally created Wordpress site on OVHCloud

sandmodal.title: Complete site for a Nutritionist coach
sandmodal.text1: Project carried out as a self-employed person, developed in ReactJs
sandmodal.text2: Complete creation of the site of a nutritionist coach, presenting her activity, her products and allowing the user to make an appointment
sandmodal.text3: Initialize an app with Create React App
sandmodal.text4: Configure navigation between application pages with React Router and add external links to socials and the sales platform for Ebooks
sandmodal.text5: Develop website interface elements using React components
sandmodal.text6: Use of external APIs: Instagram for automatic integration of photos and Calendly for the consultation reservations module
sandmodal.text7: Use best practices to improve the SEO of the application
sandmodal.text8: Create a functional contact form sending data by email with EmailJs
sandmodal.text9: Deploy the application online via OVHCloud

chwmodal.title: Showcase site for CH-WebVision, the self-business created for my secondary activity
chwmodal.text1: First version of a projet aiming to present my activity and serving as a showcase and portfolio for my self-business
chwmodal.text2: Development of the application in ReactJs
chwmodal.text3: Initialize an app with Create React App
chwmodal.text4: Develop website interface elements using React components
chwmodal.text5: Using Sass for styling and animations
chwmodal.text6: Use best practices to improve the SEO of the application
chwmodal.text7: Create a functional contact form sending data by email with EmailJs
chwmodal.text8: Deploy the application online via OVHCloud

bookimodal.title: Frontend of the 'Booki' website
bookimodal.text1: Project carried out as part of the Openclassrooms class 'Web developer integrator'
bookimodal.text2: Development of the responsive Frontend of a vacation rental website
bookimodal.text3: Integrate content according to a layout with HTML and CSS
bookimodal.text4: Implement a responsive interface with HTML and CSS
bookimodal.text5: Establish a work environment appropriate for development

grimmodal.title: Backend of the 'Mon Vieux Grimoire' application
grimmodal.text1: Project carried out as part of the Openclassrooms class 'Web developer integrator'
grimmodal.text2: Creation of the backend of a book ratings application.
grimmodal.text3: Setting up a database to store user identifiers and the data they can post: adding a book and its information and the possibility of rating a book posted by another user.
grimmodal.text4: Creation of the API communicating between the database created and the frontend application provided for the project
grimmodal.text5: Implement a logical data model in accordance with regulations

kasamodal.title: Frontend in ReactJs for Kasa, real estate rental application
kasamodal.text1: Project carried out as part of the Openclassrooms class 'Web developer integrator'
kasamodal.text2: Development of the application in ReactJs for Kasa, housing rental site between individuals
kasamodal.text3: Integrate content dynamically from a JSON file containing a list of data for all slots
kasamodal.text4: Using Sass for styling and adding animations
kasamodal.text5: Configure navigation between application pages with React Router
kasamodal.text6: Initialize an app with Create React App
kasamodal.text7: Develop website interface elements using React components

ninamodal.title: Debugging and SEO optimization of a photographer's portfolio
ninamodal.text1: Project carried out as part of the Openclassrooms class 'Web developer integrator'
ninamodal.text2: The objective of this project is to discover the concept of SEO and learn to master the basics but above all to apply the modifications necessary for its improvement at the technical level.
ninamodal.text3: Optimize the performances of a website
ninamodal.text4: Debug a website using Chrome DevTools
ninamodal.text5: Write a recipe book to test a site

qwentamodal.title: Project management for MenuMaker
qwentamodal.text1: Project carried out as part of the Openclassrooms class 'Web developer integrator'
qwentamodal.text2: Project management simulation in creating an application called MenuMaker
qwentamodal.text3: Monitor the progress of the project using a project management tool
qwentamodal.text4: Write the technical specifications of a web project based on functional needs
qwentamodal.text5: Break a feature into tasks to prepare for development

sophiemodal.title: Frontend of Sophie Bluel's portfolio, Interior designer
sophiemodal.text1: Project carried out as part of the Openclassrooms class 'Web developer integrator'
sophiemodal.text2: Development of the 'from scratch' login page and the dynamic aspect of an interior designer portfolio in connection with the API provided for the project.
sophiemodal.text3: Show all projects matching API data dynamically on the home page
sophiemodal.text4: Be able to log in as administrator with the corresponding credentials in the API
sophiemodal.text5: Create a modal allowing as an administrator to add and remove project elements in the API
sophiemodal.text6: Retrieve user data in JavaScript via forms

monotext.text1: Having always been passionate about tech and the web field,
monotext.text2: I decided, after 15 years working in restaurants, to to learn developing.
monotext.text3: Dynamic, curious and a perfectionist, I can’t wait to put it into practice
monotext.text4: the skills acquired today and learn new ones
monotext.text6: I also launched my self-employed secondary activity in November 2023.
monotext.text7: It consists of the creation, management of hosting and maintenance
monotext.text8: websites for self-employed people, VSEs/SMEs and individuals.
